majorArcana.name: The Fool
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Holding back, recklessness, risk-taking

majorArcana.name: The Magician
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents

majorArcana.name: The High Priestess
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, the subconscious mind
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal

majorArcana.name: The Empress
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Creative block, dependence on others

majorArcana.name: The Emperor
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: Authority, establishment, structure, a father figure
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline, inflexibility

majorArcana.name: The Hierophant
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo

majorArcana.name: The Lovers
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values

majorArcana.name: The Chariot
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Self-discipline, opposition, lack of direction

majorArcana.name: Strength
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Self doubt, low energy, raw emotion, lack of control

majorArcana.name: The Hermit
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: Soul searching, introspection, inner guidance, solitude
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal

majorArcana.name: Wheel of Fortune
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Bad luck, lack of control, resistance to change

majorArcana.name: Justice
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty

majorArcana.name: The Hanged Man
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Delays, resistance, stalling, indecision

majorArcana.name: Death
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging

majorArcana.name: Temperance
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment

majorArcana.name: The Devil
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment

majorArcana.name: The Tower
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster

majorArcana.name: The Star
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection

majorArcana.name: The Moon
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion

majorArcana.name: The Sun
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Temporary depression, lack of success, unrealistic expectations

majorArcana.name: Judgement
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call

majorArcana.name: The World
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Seeking personal closure, short-cut to success

wands.name: Ace of Wands
wands.reversedMeaning: Lack of energy, lack of passion, boredom

wands.name: Two of Wands
wands.uprightMeaning: Future planning, making decisions, leaving comfort zone
wands.reversedMeaning: Poor planning, overanalysis, stuck in comfort zone

wands.name: Three of Wands
wands.reversedMeaning: Playing small, lack of foresight, unexpected delays

wands.name: Four of Wands
wands.reversedMeaning: Personal celebration, inner harmony, conflict with others

wands.name: Five of Wands
wands.reversedMeaning: Inner conflict, conflict avoidance, tension release

wands.name: Six of Wands
wands.reversedMeaning: Private achievement, personal definition of success, fall from grace

wands.name: Eight of Wands
wands.uprightMeaning: Swiftness, speed, progress, movement, quick decisions, air travel
wands.reversedMeaning: Delays, frustration, resisting change, internal alignment

wands.name: Nine of Wands
wands.uprightMeaning: Resilience, courage, persistence, test of faith, boundaries
wands.reversedMeaning: Inner resources, struggle, overwhelm, defensive, paranoia

wands.name: Ten of Wands
wands.uprightMeaning: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion
wands.reversedMeaning: Doing it all, carrying the burden, delegation, release

wands.name: Page of Wands
wands.uprightMeaning: Inspiration, ideas, discovery, limitless potential, free spirit
wands.reversedMeaning: Newly-formed ideas, redirecting energy, self-limiting beliefs, a spiritual path

wands.name: Knight of Wands
wands.uprightMeaning: Energy, passion, inspired action, adventure, impulsiveness
wands.reversedMeaning: Passion project, haste, scattered energy, delays, frustration

wands.name: Queen of Wands
wands.uprightMeaning: Courage, confidence, independence, social butterfly, determination
wands.reversedMeaning: Self-respect, self-confidence, introverted, jealousy, demanding, temperamental

cups.name: Three of Cups
cups.reversedMeaning: Independence, alone time, hardcore partying, 'three's a crowd'

cups.name: Four of Cups
cups.reversedMeaning: Retreat, withdrawal, checking in for alignment

cups.name: Six of Cups
cups.uprightMeaning: Revisiting the past, childhood memories, innocence, joy
cups.reversedMeaning: Living in the past, forgiveness, lacking playfulness

cups.name: Seven of Cups
cups.reversedMeaning: Alignment, personal values, overwhelmed by choices

cups.name: Eight of Cups
cups.reversedMeaning: Trying one more time, indecision, aimless drifting, walking away

cups.name: Nine of Cups
cups.uprightMeaning: Contentment, satisfaction, gratitude, wish come true

cups.name: Ten of Cups
cups.uprightMeaning: Divine love, blissful relationships, harmony, alignment

cups.name: Page of Cups
cups.uprightMeaning: Creative opportunities, intuitive messages, curiosity, possibility
cups.reversedMeaning: New ideas, doubting intuition, creative blocks, emotional immaturity

cups.name: Queen of Cups
cups.uprightMeaning: Compassionate, caring, emotionally stable, intuitive, in flow
cups.reversedMeaning: Inner compassion, self-care, co-dependency, emotional volatility

cups.name: King of Cups
cups.reversedMeaning: Self-compassion, inner feelings, moodiness, emotionally manipulative

swords.name: Two of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: Difficult decisions, weighing up options, an impasse, avoidance

swords.name: Three of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: Heartbreak, emotional pain, sorrow, grief, hurt
swords.reversedMeaning: Negative self-talk, releasing pain, optimism, forgiveness

swords.name: Five of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: Conflict, disagreements, competition, defeat, winning at all costs

swords.name: Six of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: Transition, change, rite of passage, releasing baggage
swords.reversedMeaning: Personal transition, resistance to change, unfinished business

swords.name: Seven of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: Betrayal, deception, getting away with something, acting strategically

swords.name: Eight of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: Negative thinking, restricted freedom, imprisonment, victim mentality

swords.name: Nine of Swords
swords.reversedMeaning: Inner turmoil, deep-seated fears, secrets, releasing worry

swords.name: Ten of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: Painful endings, deep wounds, betrayal, loss, crisis
swords.reversedMeaning: Recovery, regeneration, resisting an inevitable end

swords.name: Page of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: New ideas, curiosity, thirst for knowledge, new ways of communicating
swords.reversedMeaning: Self-expression, all talk and no action, haphazard action, haste

swords.name: Knight of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: Ambitious, action-oriented, driven to succeed, fast-thinking

swords.name: Queen of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: Independent, unbiased judgement, clear boundaries, direct communication

swords.name: King of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: Mental clarity, intellectual power, authority, truth
swords.reversedMeaning: Quiet power, inner truth, misuse of power, manipulation

pentacles.name: Ace of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: A new financial or career opportunity, manifestation, abundance
pentacles.reversedMeaning: Lost opportunity, lack of planning, poor financial investment

pentacles.name: Two of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: Multiple priorities, time management, prioritisation, adaptability

pentacles.name: Four of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: Saving money, security, conservatism, scarcity, control

pentacles.name: Five of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: Financial loss, poverty, lack mindset, isolation, worry
pentacles.reversedMeaning: Recovery from financial loss, spiritual poverty

pentacles.name: Six of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: Giving, receiving, sharing wealth, generosity, charity

pentacles.name: Seven of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: Harvest, rewards, results, growth, progress, perseverance, patience
pentacles.reversedMeaning: Lack of rewards, impatience, lack of long-term vision

pentacles.name: Eight of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: Apprenticeship, repetitive tasks, mastery, skill development
pentacles.reversedMeaning: Lack of focus, perfectionism, wanting recognition

pentacles.name: Ten of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: Wealth, financial security, family, long-term success, contribution
pentacles.reversedMeaning: The fleeting nature of material wealth, family financial issues

pentacles.name: Page of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: Learning, studying, apprenticeship, manifestation, financial opportunity, skill development

pentacles.name: Queen of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: Nurturing, practical, providing financially, a working parent

pentacles.name: King of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: Financial abundance, business, leadership, security, discipline, abundance
pentacles.reversedMeaning: Financially inept, obsessed with wealth and status, stubborn
